snippet: Factory orders went up 0.7 percent in May from April, the Commerce Department said; the increase is a welcome sign after two months of declines.
lead_paragraph: Factory orders went up 0.7 percent in May from April, the Commerce Department said; the increase is a welcome sign after two months of declines.

headline.seo: Orders for U.S. Manufactured Goods Increased in May
headline.main: Orders for U.S. Manufactured Goods Increased in May
headline.print_headline: Orders for U.S. Manufactured Goods Increased in May
